channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road block creating hazardous intersection for commuting cyclists, 10th November
item.description:
A new fence set up by Westminster seems to be blocking the way for cyclists. This already hazardous intersection (cyclists re-joining the bike lane from constitution hill road car lane with no regard for priority traffic) is now been made extra hazardous as incoming and ongoing traffic are forced through a small gate. A second gate could resolve this slightly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Constitution Hill, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement not swept, 10th November
item.description:
Pavement outside 118 Avondale Road has not been swept for over 2 weeks. It is scheduled for every Monday. Have checked today and leaves are still there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avondale Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human forest bikes blocking parking bays, 10th November
item.description:
There are human forest bikes restricting the accesss for parking outside 4 Manchester Square. Some of the bikes are fallen over the pavement. It needs to be removed to minimise potential hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manchester Square, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two sofas fly-tipped right in front of 4-5 Copley Close., 10th November
item.description:
Two sofas fly-tipped right in front of 4-5 Copley Close. There is another report on the same sofas on website, but the case is closed as resolved. Since it is not resolved I am reporting again.

item.title: Overflowing bins on pavement, 10th November
item.description:
The pavement is blocked by bags of rubbish and the rubbish bin, making it difficult to pass by with a buggy and tripping hazard. It also smells terrible and has been there for over a week. Can the residents be informed not to place rubbish on pavements.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cleveleys Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 10th November

item.title: Entire cycle path unusable, 10th November
item.description:
The cycle path on Bromley common needs attention. I cycle to work but am forced to use the road on Bromley common because the cycle path is awful especially with slick road tyres. Can it be tarmac-ed please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Bromley Common, Bromley Common, London

item.title: Continuons illegal parking in Saint Matthews House., 10th November
item.description:
Saint Matthews House courtyard is now a free car park for everyone who wishes to leave their car overnight or during the day. It's safe the police or the traffic warren won't do anything about it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
